390.play: He hath not told us of the captain yet: A solemn combination shall be made

391.play: He hath not told us of the captain yet: Of our dear souls. Meantime, sweet sister,

392.play: He hath not told us of the captain yet: We will not part from hence. Cesario, come;

393.play: He hath not told us of the captain yet: For so you shall be, while you are a man;

394.play: He hath not told us of the captain yet: But when in other habits you are seen,

395.play: He hath not told us of the captain yet: Orsino's mistress and his fancy's queen.
